page.title: 18Children's Games Part 1
page.content: To amuse themselves during playtimes boys and girls play various games. A popular game with boys is football. This game is played by most of the boys. Another game that is played by the boys is cricket ,this is not as popular as football but still attracts most of the boys. A not so popular game is rounders although girls play this game as well. Boys usually fight in a friendly way amongst themselves. These are some of the games boys play outside of school.Boys play football using drains and garages as goals.Boys also play cricket and ride bikes. Boys play short tennis and badminton and sometimes their own game of squash using a tennis ball and hitting it against a wall. Boys also play indoor games such as Monopoly and younger children often play with model cars.
